title: Scarf, 1920–29
medium: Technique: Plain weave foundation. Hand-painted using batik process.  Dots in border probably printed.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 84 x 84.5 cm (33 1/16 x 33 1/4 in.)
description: Square divided diagonally with exotic bird on one side, exotic flowers on the other. Border of white dots. Elements of the design are similar to the work of the Ballets Russe.

tombstone.epitaph: Scarf, 1920–29.Technique: Plain weave foundation. Hand-painted using batik process.  Dots in border probably printed.. 1990-8-2.
